MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the DG7 postcode area of Castle Douglas affecting Leathes Farm and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete a repair on overhead line at Leaths spur, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11.10am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:40am on 28TH January 2021.
